name: @vjs-10/react
description: React library for building media players

scripts.compile:skins: npm run compile:skins:css-modules && npm run compile:skins:inline
scripts.compile:skins:css-modules: node ../../build-tools/vjs-compiler/dist/cli.js compile src/skins/default/MediaSkinDefault.tsx --type skin --format react --css css-modules --out-dir src/skins/default/compiled/css-modules
scripts.compile:skins:inline: node ../../build-tools/vjs-compiler/dist/cli.js compile src/skins/default/MediaSkinDefault.tsx --type skin --format react --css inline --out-dir src/skins/default/compiled/inline
